name: Jannie
description: Jannie was gut, she was here, she did stuff

name: Reality card
description: Description description

name: Dream card test
description: Description description

name: Boss card tes
description: Description description

name: Great library
description: You encounter a library cataloguing all the dreams ever dreamt by humans.

name: Tax recounting
description: The villagers have all forgotten how to count. They see you are not of this world, and ask you to help count their local treasury.

name: Gate of dreams
description: You stand before the Gate of Dreams. The two guardians, Thog and Thok, ask you questions to determine whether you are worthy of passage.

name: Cave of Visions
description: You enter a cave that is home to the forgotten nightmares of humanity.

name: Strange mushrooms
description: Starving, you decide to eat the blue shining mushrooms found on the forest floor.

name: Celestial music
description: You overhear the most wondrous harp music, filling the air around you.

name: Nightmare monster
description: You see a nightmarish abomination devouring a carcass in the middle of the road.

name: Realistic dream
description: You walk around familiar streets in your home city. You know this is a dream but somehow, you feel at home.

name: Stampede
description: A stampede of Mustangs from the plains near Dylath-Leen is closing in. You can hear the ground tremble as a thousand hooves approach.

choices.description: You try to mount a mustang and use it for quick travel.
You climb a nearby tree to wait out the stampede.

name: Native village
description: You encounter a village of native people living peacefully, in harmony with nature.

choices.description: You choose to live with the natives for a while. Centuries pass, yet in the real world, it seems as if no time had passed at all.

name: Crow formation
description: You see a strange sign formed by the flock of crows flying overhead.

choices.description: You try to figure out the sign and follow the crows for a while.
You decide to ignore the crows and continue on your journey.

name: Early hours
description: You have to wake up for work early tomorrow, and therefore can't get much sleep.

name: Accident witness
description: You have witnessed a gruesome traffic accident, and are haunted by the images.

name: Jet Lag
description: After traveling a long distance, you have trouble staying awake but are unable to fall asleep.

name: Professor Warren Bedford
description: A professor of ethnology at the university, Bedford has read much about the land of dreams, but naturally rejected it as fantasy. Until one day, he was visited by the ghost of his long deceased grandfather, and was brought to the land of Dream to help prevent the incoming catastrophe.

name: John Snyder
description: John has worked at the docks for the greater part of his adult life. Between the long hours and his family, he doesn't get much sleep. Nevertheless, he is a very experienced dreamer. John had entered the land of Dream physically for the first time when he was around six and wandered into a portal in a magical forest. He managed to return, but every night, John had retreated back to relive his fantasies.

name: Coiled Serpent
description: Serpent had grown up in a tribal society, being raised to become the next shaman and visionary for the tribe. But her family wanted a better life for her, and so they moved to a big city to raise Serpent in a modern way. Serpent has successfully integrated into society, but has not lost contact with her origins, often visiting her home tribe and practising the age-old traditions of traveling between worlds that she has been taught.
